title: How to Acquire the Bat Form Eternal in SOTN

steps.title: Make sure you have the Leap Stone and the Soul of Mist before attempting.
steps.content: Make sure you have the Leap Stone and the Soul of Mist before attempting.

steps.title: Now, head to the Long Library.
steps.content: Now, head to the Long Library.

steps.title: Keep on heading in until you are going down a lot of stairs.
steps.content: Keep on heading in until you are going down a lot of stairs. While you are walking near the top will be a thing above you. Ignore it. But, when you find a second thing like it, Double jump up to it, continue from here.

steps.title: Now in this room, kill the enemy's while advancing.
steps.content: Now in this room, kill the enemy's while advancing.

steps.title: Once in the next room, continue on while falling where you can.
steps.content: Once in the next room, continue on while falling where you can. Once you have advanced long enough, the walls will shut behind here and you will fight a boss. His name is the Lesser Demon. This was not easy, so it will probably take a few tries.

steps.title: Once he is defeated, head on until you hit a grate.
steps.content: Once he is defeated, head on until you hit a grate. Use Soul of Mist to pass, in here is the Soul of Bat.
